com.communote.server.api.core.installer

Interface CommunoteInstaller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommunoteInstallerImpl

    public interface CommunoteInstaller
    Helper to install Communote. The methods should be called in the following order
    • updateDatabaseSettings(DatabaseType, Map)
    • initializeDatabase(DatabaseInitializationStatusCallback)
    • createCommunoteAccount(String, String)
    • initializeCommunoteAccount(UserVO, Map)
    • initializeApplicationAfterInstallation()
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • canConnectToDatabase

        boolean canConnectToDatabase()
        Returns:
        whether it is possible to connect to the database with the current database configuration settings as returned by getDatabaseSettings()

      • createCommunoteAccount

        void createCommunoteAccount(String accountName,
                            String timezoneId)
                     throws InvalidClientIdException,
                            CommunoteInstallerException
        Create the Communote account (aka the global client).
        Parameters:
        accountName - the name of the account
        timezoneId - the ID of the timezone
        Throws:
        InvalidClientIdException - in case the configured ID of the global client is not valid
        CommunoteInstallerException - in case creating the client failed

      • getAdminAccount

        User getAdminAccount()
        Returns:
        an existing administrator user or null if there is none yet

      • getCommunoteAccount

        ClientTO getCommunoteAccount()
        Returns:
        the details of the Communote account (aka global client) or null if the account has not been created yet

      • getDatabaseSettings

        StartupProperties getDatabaseSettings()
        Returns:
        the current database connection settings

      • getDatabaseType

        DatabaseType getDatabaseType()
        Returns:
        the database type of the current database connection settings

      • getSupportedDatabaseType

        DatabaseType getSupportedDatabaseType(String identifier)
        Get the database type for the given identifier
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier of the type
        Returns:
        the database type or null if there is no matching type

      • getSupportedDatabaseTypes

        List<DatabaseType> getSupportedDatabaseTypes()
        Returns:
        get a list of supported database types

      • initializeApplicationAfterInstallation

        void initializeApplicationAfterInstallation()
                                     throws BootstrapException
        Initialize the application if all steps of the installation were completed.
        Throws:
        BootstrapException - in case not all steps of the installation were completed

      • initializeCommunoteAccount

        void initializeCommunoteAccount(UserVO adminAccount,
                                Map<ApplicationProperty,String> params)
                         throws EmailValidationException,
                                ConfigurationInitializationException,
                                CommunoteInstallerException
        Initialize the Communote account (aka global client) that was previously created with createCommunoteAccount(String, String)
        Parameters:
        adminAccount - VO with details of the first Communote user with administrative privileges
        params - application parameters to initialize the Communote account with
        Throws:
        EmailValidationException - in case the email address of the administrator user is invalid
        ConfigurationInitializationException - in case the provided application parameters caused an error
        CommunoteInstallerException - in case the initialization failed

      • initializeDatabase

        boolean initializeDatabase(DatabaseInitializationStatusCallback statusCallback)
        Initialize the application database and inform the provided callback about the current status.
        Parameters:
        statusCallback - the callback to receive status updates
        Returns:
        true if the initialization succeeded, false otherwise

      • isDatabaseInitialized

        boolean isDatabaseInitialized()
        Returns whether the global database is initialized, which is the schema exists.
        Returns:
        true if the database is initialized

      • updateDatabaseSettings

        StartupProperties updateDatabaseSettings(DatabaseType type,
                                         Map<CoreConfigurationPropertyConstant,String> settings)
                                  throws ConfigurationUpdateException
        Update the database settings and return the resulting configuration.
        Parameters:
        type - the database type
        settings - the settings like host and username for connecting to the database of the given type
        Returns:
        the new configuration
        Throws:
        ConfigurationUpdateException - in case the configuration cannot be saved
